name: SolidCircle
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: solid circle
des:
SolidCircle is a Michigan-based process innovation and software company that specializes in business, local government and non-profit applications.

Business: We focus on providing personalized solutions for all of the headaches associated with data management that are preventing your business from operating with efficiency. Our team is committed to providing peace of mind through an array of innovative process solutions to align with your current and future business needs. Maintaining finances, managing employee documents, logging payroll, and many other operational functions are greatly simplified with our tools like docMgt for AP, and docMgt for HR, to name a few. Each of these tools offer excellent usability and are specialized to provide top-tier organization of data flow, allowing your business team to maximize time and productivity.

Local Government: There's no unified justice system in the U.S. today that is on the same database...others are just integrations. Say goodbye to data entry errors, duplicate entries, litigation, fees for hardcopy filing and transportation, and other preventable inefficiencies with our mobile and web-based unified justice suite that offers realtime access.

Non-Profit: With a little help from SolidCircle, you no longer have to stress the unaffordable risks like poor compliance, lost documents, late reporting, duplicate entry, failed audits, and hard-copy vulnerability. We’ll help simplify your reporting procedures, strengthen operational processes, fight claw back, and provide unwavering support all while saving you money.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
